item.title: Cool html codes for your site FF IE O & NN
item.dc:creator: @Winter_Ice Winter Ice
item.description:
@Winter_Ice wrote:

thats mean crayola.com… you should change it to sorry.html and then make a new page called sorry.html and in that page add

<html><head><title>Sorry</title><body><center><br><br><br><br><hr><h1> Im sorry but your under 12 years old and you cannot enter this site.</h1><hr><br><a href="The Url or page you just came from">Return</a><hr>
</body></html>

there we go a little well less mean

item.title: Cool html codes for your site FF IE O & NN
item.dc:creator: @littlesoul littlesoul
item.description:
@littlesoul wrote:

Remove any thing if asked (pm me)

gay guild mostly funny

[center]go to this site[/center]

[center]http://rainbow.arch.scriptmania.com/scripts/index.html[/center]

you will then see lots of links on the left hand side

find one you would like to add to your site

www.freewebs.com

i use freewebs log in and click edit on your index.html file add the html and click save you cant ( CTRL + S ) check out your site with the new stuf posting this because the stuf on there is realy funny

add this one edit a little to match your site…


<!-- Add this onLoad event handler into the BODY tag  -->

<BODY onLoad="getName()">

<!--Simply paste this code into the HEAD of your HTML document-->

<SCRIPT language=JavaScript>

<!-- This script and many more are available free online at -->
<!-- http://rainbow.arch.scriptmania.com -->

<!-- Begin
function getName() {
var name1 = prompt("What is your name?", "")
var age = prompt("How old are you?", "")
var email1 = prompt("What's your e-mail address?", "")
if( age <= 12) {
alert("Hey kid...  You're only " + age + " and expect to stay here!!  \nNo way!  " + name1 + " get out of here!  \nIf you are at " + email1 + " , then I have your e-mail too!!")
window.open('age.html','PopupName','toolbar=0,location=0,status=0,menubar=0,scrollbars=0,resizable=0,width=500,height=400');
window.location=("http://www.crayola.com")

} else {
alert("Hello " + name1 + "  Welcome to Rainbow Arch.  \nSince you are " + age + ", you are allowed to stay!!  \nIf your e-mail is " + email1 + ", you can expect some e-mail soon....")
   }
}

// End -->
</SCRIPT>

it foruces a window and ask’s for name (any) age above one that you set ( has to be above 12) lmao and email adress links you to http://www.crayola.com/ if your 12 or under lmfao!!!
